metadata.title: Calendar
metadata.description: Manage your training plan with our interactive calendar.

freeTrialCalendarMessage.message: Because you are on a free trial, we're only displaying the first 8 weeks of your training plan.

previousPlanButton.confirmationText: Are you sure you want to go back to your previous plan? This will delete your current plan.
previousPlanButton.errorMessage: Going back to Previous Plan failed!

skipWorkoutButton.confirmationText: Are you sure you want to skip this workout? This cannot be undone. You can also reorder workouts by clicking and dragging them.

completedActivityPopup.confirmationText: Are you sure you want to delete this activity? This cannot be undone.

feedbackItem.confirmationText: Are you sure you want to delete this feedback? This cannot be undone.

weekTotals.noDataMessage: You have no data for this week!

labels.calendar: You can move planned workouts via drag and drop.
labels.scheduledWorkout: You can mark or unmark a workout as completed. If you want to delete a workout from your training plan, you can click 'Skip Workout'. In case you skip a workout we take note and potentially suggest adjustments to your plan to keep you on track for your goal. These adjustments are delivered via our notifications.
